Title: JFK
Writer: Oliver Stone (screenplay), Zachary Sklar (screenplay), Jim Garrison (book), Jim Marrs (book)
Actors: Sally Kirkland, Anthony Ramirez, Ray LePere, Steve Reed
Plot: New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.
Production: Camelot Pictures, Warner Brothers, Regency Enterprises, Ixtlan Corporation, Alcor Films
